1: וַיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> בַּיָּמִ֣ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it came to pass in those days</n> הָהֵ֔ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>those</n> וּמֶ֖לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>when [there was] no king</n> אֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>in Israel</n> וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>that there was a certain</n> לֵוִ֗י <sup>3881 </sup> <n>Levite</n> גָּ֚ר <sup>1481 </sup> <n>sojourning</n> בְּיַרְכְּתֵ֣י <sup>3411 </sup> <n>on the side</n> הַר־ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>of mount</n> אֶפְרַ֔יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>who took</n> לוֹ֙ אִשָּׁ֣ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>ess</n> פִילֶ֔גֶשׁ <sup>6370 </sup> <n>A concubine</n> מִבֵּ֥ית לֶ֖חֶם <sup>1035 </sup> <n>Bethlehem</n> יְהוּדָֽה׃ <sup>3063 </sup> <n>Judah</n>
2: וַתִּזְנֶ֤ה <sup>2181 </sup> <n>played the whore</n> עָלָיו֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> פִּֽילַגְשׁ֔וֹ <sup>6370 </sup> <n>And his concubine</n> וַתֵּ֤לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> מֵֽאִתּוֹ֙ <sup>853 </sup> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> אָבִ֔יהָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>from him unto her father's</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> בֵּ֥ית לֶ֖חֶם <sup>1035 </sup> <n>Bethlehem</n> יְהוּדָ֑ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>Judah</n> וַתְּהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> שָׁ֕ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>was there</n> יָמִ֖ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>A period</n> אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <sup>702 </sup> <n>and was there four</n> חֳדָשִֽׁים׃ <sup>2320 </sup> <n>months</n>
3: וַיָּ֨קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>arose</n> אִישָׁ֜הּ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And her husband</n> וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and went</n> אַחֲרֶ֗יהָ <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> לְדַבֵּ֤ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>her to speak</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> לִבָּהּ֙ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>friendly</n> [לַהֲשִׁיבֹו כ] (לַהֲשִׁיבָ֔הּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>break</n> ק) וְנַעֲר֥וֹ <sup>5288 </sup> <n>having his servant</n> עִמּ֖וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>and a</n> וְצֶ֣מֶד <sup>6776 </sup> <n>with him and a couple</n> חֲמֹרִ֑ים <sup>2543 </sup> <n>of asses</n> וַתְּבִיאֵ֙הוּ֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and she brought</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> אָבִ֔יהָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>him into her father's</n> וַיִּרְאֵ֙הוּ֙ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> אֲבִ֣י <sup>1 </sup> <n>and when the father</n> הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ה <sup>5291 </sup> <n>of the damsel</n> וַיִּשְׂמַ֖ח <sup>8055 </sup> <n>him he rejoiced</n> לִקְרָאתֽוֹ׃ <sup>7125 </sup> <n>to meet</n>
4: וַיֶּחֱזַק־ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>retained</n> בּ֤וֹ חֹֽתְנוֹ֙ <sup>2859 </sup> <n>And his father in law</n> אֲבִ֣י <sup>1 </sup> <n>father</n> הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ה <sup>5291 </sup> <n>the damsel's</n> וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>him and he abode</n> אִתּ֖וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <sup>7969 </sup> <n>with him three</n> יָמִ֑ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n> וַיֹּאכְלוּ֙ <sup>398 </sup> <n>so they did eat</n> וַיִּשְׁתּ֔וּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and drink</n> וַיָּלִ֖ינוּ <sup>3885 </sup> <n>and lodged</n> שָֽׁם׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n>
5: וַֽיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> הָרְבִיעִ֔י <sup>7243 </sup> <n>And it came to pass on the fourth</n> וַיַּשְׁכִּ֥ימוּ <sup>7925 </sup> <n>when they arose early</n> בַבֹּ֖קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>in the morning</n> וַיָּ֣קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>that he rose up</n> לָלֶ֑כֶת <sup>1980 </sup> <n>to go</n> וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֲבִ֨י <sup>1 </sup> <n>father</n> הַֽנַּעֲרָ֜ה <sup>5291 </sup> <n>and the damsel's</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to his</n> חֲתָנ֗וֹ <sup>2860 </sup> <n>unto his son in law</n> סְעָ֧ד <sup>5582 </sup> <n>Comfort</n> לִבְּךָ֛ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>thine heart</n> פַּת־ <sup>6595 </sup> <n>with a morsel</n> לֶ֖חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>of bread</n> וְאַחַ֥ר <sup>310 </sup> <n>and afterward</n> תֵּלֵֽכוּ׃ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>may go</n>
6: וַיֵּשְׁב֗וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>And they sat down</n> וַיֹּאכְל֧וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>and did eat</n> שְׁנֵיהֶ֛ם <sup>8147 </sup> <n>both</n> יַחְדָּ֖ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>of them together</n> וַיִּשְׁתּ֑וּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and drink</n> וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>had said</n> אֲבִ֤י <sup>1 </sup> <n>father</n> הַֽנַּעֲרָה֙ <sup>5291 </sup> <n>for the damsel's</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָאִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>unto the man</n> הֽוֹאֶל־ <sup>2974 </sup> <n>Be content</n> נָ֥א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> וְלִ֖ין <sup>3885 </sup> <n>I pray thee and tarry all night</n> וְיִטַ֥ב <sup>3190 </sup> <n>be merry</n> לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>and let thine heart</n>
7: וַיָּ֥קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>rose up</n> הָאִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And when the man</n> לָלֶ֑כֶת <sup>1980 </sup> <n>to go</n> וַיִּפְצַר־ <sup>6484 </sup> <n>urged</n> בּוֹ֙ חֹתְנ֔וֹ <sup>2859 </sup> <n>his father in law</n> וַיָּ֖שָׁב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>there again</n> וַיָּ֥לֶן <sup>3885 </sup> <n>him therefore he lodged</n> שָֽׁם׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n>
8: וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <sup>7925 </sup> <n>And he arose early</n> בַּבֹּ֜קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>in the morning</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> הַחֲמִישִׁי֮ <sup>2549 </sup> <n>on the fifth</n> לָלֶכֶת֒ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>to go</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֲבִ֣י <sup>1 </sup> <n>father</n> הַֽנַּעֲרָ֗ה <sup>5291 </sup> <n>and the damsel's</n> סְעָד־ <sup>5582 </sup> <n>Comfort</n> נָא֙ <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> לְבָ֣בְךָ֔ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>thine heart</n> וְהִֽתְמַהְמְה֖וּ <sup>4102 </sup> <n>I pray thee And they tarried</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> נְט֣וֹת <sup>5186 </sup> <n>afternoon</n> הַיּ֑וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> וַיֹּאכְל֖וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>and they did eat</n> שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>8147 </sup> <n>both</n>
9: וַיָּ֤קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>rose up</n> הָאִישׁ֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And when the man</n> לָלֶ֔כֶת <sup>1980 </sup> <n>that thou mayest go</n> ה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וּפִילַגְשׁ֖וֹ <sup>6370 </sup> <n>he and his concubine</n> וְנַעֲר֑וֹ <sup>5288 </sup> <n>and his servant</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> ל֣וֹ חֹתְנ֣וֹ <sup>2859 </sup> <n>his father in law</n> אֲבִ֣י <sup>1 </sup> <n>father</n> הַֽנַּעֲרָ֡ה <sup>5291 </sup> <n>the damsel's</n> הִנֵּ֣ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> נָא֩ <sup>4994 </sup> <n>now</n> רָפָ֨ה <sup>7503 </sup> <n>draweth</n> הַיּ֜וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>unto him Behold now the day</n> לַעֲרֹ֗ב <sup>6150 </sup> <n>toward evening</n> לִֽינוּ־ <sup>3885 </sup> <n>I pray you tarry all night</n> נָ֞א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>please</n> הִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Lo</n> חֲנ֤וֹת <sup>2583 </sup> <n>groweth to an end</n> הַיּוֹם֙ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>behold the day</n> לִ֥ין <sup>3885 </sup> <n>lodge</n> פֹּה֙ <sup>6311 </sup> <n>here</n> וְיִיטַ֣ב <sup>3190 </sup> <n>may be merry</n> לְבָבֶ֔ךָ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>here that thine heart</n> וְהִשְׁכַּמְתֶּ֤ם <sup>7925 </sup> <n>get you early</n> מָחָר֙ <sup>4279 </sup> <n>and to morrow</n> לְדַרְכְּכֶ֔ם <sup>1870 </sup> <n>on your way</n> וְהָלַכְתָּ֖ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>you may go</n> לְאֹהָלֶֽךָ׃ <sup>168 </sup> <n>home</n>
10: וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>was not</n> אָבָ֤ה <sup>14 </sup> <n>would</n> הָאִישׁ֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>But the man</n> לָל֔וּן <sup>3885 </sup> <n>not tarry that night</n> וַיָּ֣קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>but he rose up</n> וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and departed</n> וַיָּבֹא֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and came</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>to</n> נֹ֣כַח <sup>5227 </sup> <n>over against</n> יְב֔וּס <sup>2982 </sup> <n>Jebus</n> הִ֖יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>which [is] Jerusalem</n> וְעִמּ֗וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> צֶ֤מֶד <sup>6776 </sup> <n>and [there were] with him two</n> חֲמוֹרִים֙ <sup>2543 </sup> <n>asses</n> חֲבוּשִׁ֔ים <sup>2280 </sup> <n>saddled</n> וּפִילַגְשׁ֖וֹ <sup>6370 </sup> <n>his concubine</n> עִמּֽוֹ׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n>
11: הֵ֣ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>When</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>they near</n> יְב֔וּס <sup>2982 </sup> <n>[And] when they [were] by Jebus</n> וְהַיּ֖וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>the day</n> רַ֣ד <sup>7286 </sup> <n>spent</n> מְאֹ֑ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>was far</n> וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> הַנַּ֜עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>and the servant</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to his</n> אֲדֹנָ֗יו <sup>113 </sup> <n>unto his master</n> לְכָה־ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>come</n> נָּ֛א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> וְנָס֛וּרָה <sup>5493 </sup> <n>I pray thee and let us turn in</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> עִֽיר־ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>into this city</n> הַיְבוּסִ֥י <sup>2983 </sup> <n>of the Jebusites</n> הַזֹּ֖את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> וְנָלִ֥ין <sup>3885 </sup> <n>and lodge</n> בָּֽהּ׃
12: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֵלָיו֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אֲדֹנָ֔יו <sup>113 </sup> <n>And his master</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>We will not</n> נָסוּר֙ <sup>5493 </sup> <n>unto him We will not turn aside</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> עִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>hither into the city</n> נָכְרִ֔י <sup>5237 </sup> <n>of a stranger</n> אֲשֶׁ֛ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> מִבְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>that [is] not of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> הֵ֑נָּה <sup>2008 </sup> <n>here</n> וְעָבַ֖רְנוּ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>we will pass over</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>far</n> גִּבְעָֽה׃ <sup>1390 </sup> <n>to Gibeah</n>
13: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> לְנַעֲר֔וֹ <sup>5288 </sup> <n>unto his servant</n> לְךָ֥ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Come</n> וְנִקְרְבָ֖ה <sup>7126 </sup> <n>and let us draw near</n> בְּאַחַ֣ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>to one</n> הַמְּקֹמ֑וֹת <sup>4725 </sup> <n>of these places</n> וְלַ֥נּוּ <sup>3885 </sup> <n>to lodge all night</n> בַגִּבְעָ֖ה <sup>1390 </sup> <n>in Gibeah</n> א֥וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> בָרָמָֽה׃ <sup>7414 </sup> <n>or in Ramah</n>
14: וַיַּעַבְר֖וּ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>And they passed on</n> וַיֵּלֵ֑כוּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and went</n> וַתָּבֹ֤א <sup>935 </sup> <n>went down</n> לָהֶם֙ הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>and the sun</n> אֵ֥צֶל <sup>681 </sup> <n>upon them [when they were] by</n> הַגִּבְעָ֖ה <sup>1390 </sup> <n>Gibeah</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לְבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <sup>1144 </sup> <n>which [belongeth] to Benjamin</n>
15: וַיָּסֻ֣רוּ <sup>5493 </sup> <n>And they turned aside</n> שָׁ֔ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> לָב֖וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>thither to go in</n> לָל֣וּן <sup>3885 </sup> <n>[and] to lodge</n> בַּגִּבְעָ֑ה <sup>1390 </sup> <n>in Gibeah</n> וַיָּבֹ֗א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and when he went in</n> וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>he sat him down</n> בִּרְח֣וֹב <sup>7339 </sup> <n>in a street</n> הָעִ֔יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> אִ֛ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>for [there was] no man</n> מְאַסֵּֽף־ <sup>622 </sup> <n>that took</n> אוֹתָ֥ם <sup>853 </sup> הַבַּ֖יְתָה <sup>1004 </sup> <n>them into his house</n> לָלֽוּן׃ <sup>3885 </sup> <n>to lodging</n>
16: וְהִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> זָקֵ֗ן <sup>2205 </sup> <n>an old</n> בָּ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>And behold there came</n> מִֽן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> מַעֲשֵׂ֤הוּ <sup>4639 </sup> <n>from his work</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>out</n> הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>out of the field</n> בָּעֶ֔רֶב <sup>6153 </sup> <n>at even</n> וְהָאִישׁ֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>which [was] also</n> מֵהַ֣ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>of mount</n> אֶפְרַ֔יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> וְהוּא־ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>and he</n> גָ֖ר <sup>1481 </sup> <n>and he sojourned</n> בַּגִּבְעָ֑ה <sup>1390 </sup> <n>in Gibeah</n> וְאַנְשֵׁ֥י <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> הַמָּק֖וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>of the place</n> בְּנֵ֥י יְמִינִֽי׃ <sup>1145 </sup> <n>[were] Benjamites</n>
17: וַיִּשָּׂ֣א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>And when he had lifted up</n> עֵינָ֗יו <sup>5869 </sup> <n>his eyes</n> וַיַּ֛רְא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>he saw</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> הָאֹרֵ֖חַ <sup>732 </sup> <n>a wayfaring</n> בִּרְחֹ֣ב <sup>7339 </sup> <n>in the street</n> הָעִ֑יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> הָאִ֧ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> הַזָּקֵ֛ן <sup>2205 </sup> <n>and the old</n> אָ֥נָה <sup>575 </sup> <n>Where</n> תֵלֵ֖ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>going</n> וּמֵאַ֥יִן <sup>370 </sup> <n>thou? and whence</n> תָּבֽוֹא׃ <sup>935 </sup> <n>comest</n>
18: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> אֵלָ֗יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> עֹבְרִ֨ים <sup>5674 </sup> <n>unto him We [are] passing</n> אֲנַ֜חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>ourselves</n> מִבֵּֽית־ לֶ֣חֶם <sup>1035 </sup> <n>Bethlehem</n> יְהוּדָה֮ <sup>3063 </sup> <n>Judah</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> יַרְכְּתֵ֣י <sup>3411 </sup> <n>toward the side</n> הַר־ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>of mount</n> אֶפְרַיִם֒ <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> מִשָּׁ֣ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> אָנֹ֔כִי <sup>595 </sup> <n>and I</n> וָאֵלֵ֕ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>but I [am now] going</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> בֵּ֥ית לֶ֖חֶם <sup>1035 </sup> <n>to Bethlehem</n> יְהוּדָ֑ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>Judah</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בֵּ֤ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>to the house</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> הֹלֵ֔ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>going</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and no</n> אִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and there [is] no man</n> מְאַסֵּ֥ף <sup>622 </sup> <n>that receiveth</n> אוֹתִ֖י <sup>853 </sup> הַבָּֽיְתָה׃ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>me to house</n>
19: וְגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>is both</n> תֶּ֤בֶן <sup>8401 </sup> <n>both straw</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>and also</n> מִסְפּוֹא֙ <sup>4554 </sup> <n>and provender</n> יֵ֣שׁ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>Yet there is</n> לַחֲמוֹרֵ֔ינוּ <sup>2543 </sup> <n>for our asses</n> וְ֠גַם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>is both</n> לֶ֣חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>and there is bread</n> וָיַ֤יִן <sup>3196 </sup> <n>and wine</n> יֶשׁ־ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>there</n> לִי֙ וְלַֽאֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <sup>519 </sup> <n>also for me and for thy handmaid</n> וְלַנַּ֖עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>and for the young man</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>is with</n> עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>[which is] with thy servants</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> מַחְס֖וֹר <sup>4270 </sup> <n>[there is] no want</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of any</n> דָּבָֽר׃ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>of any thing</n>
20: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> הָאִ֤ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> הַזָּקֵן֙ <sup>2205 </sup> <n>And the old</n> שָׁל֣וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>Peace</n> לָ֔ךְ רַ֥ק <sup>7535 </sup> <n>[be] with thee howsoever</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מַחְסוֹרְךָ֖ <sup>4270 </sup> <n>[let] all thy wants</n> עָלָ֑י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> רַ֥ק <sup>7535 </sup> <n>in</n> בָּרְח֖וֹב <sup>7339 </sup> <n>not in the street</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תָּלַֽן׃ <sup>3885 </sup> <n>[lie] upon me only lodge</n>
21: וַיְבִיאֵ֣הוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>So he brought</n> לְבֵית֔וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>him into his house</n> [וַיִּבֹּול כ] (וַיָּ֖בָל <sup>1101 </sup> <n>anoint</n> ק) לַחֲמוֹרִ֑ים <sup>2543 </sup> <n>unto the asses</n> וַֽיִּרְחֲצוּ֙ <sup>7364 </sup> <n>and they washed</n> רַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>7272 </sup> <n>their feet</n> וַיֹּאכְל֖וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>and did eat</n> וַיִּשְׁתּֽוּ׃ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and drink</n>
22: הֵמָּה֮ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> מֵיטִיבִ֣ים <sup>3190 </sup> <n>merry</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> לִבָּם֒ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>[Now] as they were making their hearts</n> וְהִנֵּה֩ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> אַנְשֵׁ֨י <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> הָעִ֜יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> אַנְשֵׁ֣י <sup>376 </sup> <n>the man</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> בְלִיַּ֗עַל <sup>1100 </sup> <n>of Belial</n> נָסַ֙בּוּ֙ <sup>5437 </sup> <n>round about</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַבַּ֔יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>the house</n> מִֽתְדַּפְּקִ֖ים <sup>1849 </sup> <n>[and] beat</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> הַדָּ֑לֶת <sup>1817 </sup> <n>at the door</n> וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and spake</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הָ֠אִישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> בַּ֣עַל <sup>1167 </sup> <n>to the master</n> הַבַּ֤יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> הַזָּקֵן֙ <sup>2205 </sup> <n>the old</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> הוֹצֵ֗א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>Bring forth</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאִ֛ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>the man</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בָּ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>that came</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> בֵּיתְךָ֖ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>into thine house</n> וְנֵדָעֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>that we may know</n>
23: וַיֵּצֵ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>went out</n> אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>then</n> הָאִישׁ֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And the man</n> בַּ֣עַל <sup>1167 </sup> <n>the master</n> הַבַּ֔יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto them and said</n> אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>unto them Nay</n> אַחַ֖י <sup>251 </sup> <n>my brethren</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>No</n> תָּרֵ֣עוּ <sup>7489 </sup> <n>[nay] I pray you do not [so] wickedly</n> נָ֑א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>please</n> אַ֠חֲרֵי <sup>310 </sup> <n>seeing</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> בָּ֞א <sup>935 </sup> <n>is come</n> הָאִ֤ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>that this man</n> הַזֶּה֙ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> אַל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> בֵּיתִ֔י <sup>1004 </sup> <n>into mine house</n> אַֽל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>No</n> תַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>do</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַנְּבָלָ֥ה <sup>5039 </sup> <n>not this folly</n> הַזֹּֽאת׃ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n>
24: הִנֵּה֩ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Here</n> בִתִּ֨י <sup>1323 </sup> <n>Behold [here is] my daughter</n> הַבְּתוּלָ֜ה <sup>1330 </sup> <n>a maiden</n> וּפִֽילַגְשֵׁ֗הוּ <sup>6370 </sup> <n>and his concubine</n> אוֹצִֽיאָה־ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>them I will bring out</n> נָּ֤א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> אוֹתָם֙ <sup>853 </sup> וְעַנּ֣וּ <sup>6031 </sup> <n>now and humble</n> אוֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> וַעֲשׂ֣וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>ye them and do</n> לָהֶ֔ם הַטּ֖וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>good</n> בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>with them what seemeth</n> וְלָאִ֤ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>unto you but unto this man</n> הַזֶּה֙ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>such</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>do</n> דְּבַ֖ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>a thing</n> הַנְּבָלָ֥ה <sup>5039 </sup> <n>vile</n> הַזֹּֽאת׃ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>not so</n>
25: וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אָב֤וּ <sup>14 </sup> <n>would</n> הָאֲנָשִׁים֙ <sup>582 </sup> <n>But the men</n> לִשְׁמֹ֣עַֽ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>not hearken</n> ל֔וֹ וַיַּחֲזֵ֤ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>took</n> הָאִישׁ֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>to him so the man</n> בְּפִ֣ילַגְשׁ֔וֹ <sup>6370 </sup> <n>his concubine</n> וַיֹּצֵ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and brought</n> אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הַח֑וּץ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>her forth</n> וַיֵּדְע֣וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>unto them and they knew</n> א֠וֹתָהּ <sup>853 </sup> וַיִּֽתְעַלְּלוּ־ <sup>5953 </sup> <n>her and abused</n> בָ֤הּ כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>her all</n> הַלַּ֙יְלָה֙ <sup>3915 </sup> <n>her all the night</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> הַבֹּ֔קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>until the morning</n> וַֽיְשַׁלְּח֖וּהָ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>they let her go</n> [בַּעֲלֹות כ] (כַּעֲלֹ֥ות <sup>5927 </sup> <n>arise</n> ק) הַשָּֽׁחַר׃ <sup>7837 </sup> <n>and when the day</n>
26: וַתָּבֹ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>Then came</n> הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>the woman</n> לִפְנ֣וֹת <sup>6437 </sup> <n>in the dawning</n> הַבֹּ֑קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>of the day</n> וַתִּפֹּ֞ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>and fell down</n> פֶּ֧תַח <sup>6607 </sup> <n>at the door</n> בֵּית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> הָאִ֛ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>of the man's</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> אֲדוֹנֶ֥יהָ <sup>113 </sup> <n>where her lord</n> שָּׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>was until</n> הָאֽוֹר׃ <sup>216 </sup> <n>[was] till it was light</n>
27: וַיָּ֨קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>rose up</n> אֲדֹנֶ֜יהָ <sup>113 </sup> <n>And her lord</n> בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>in the morning</n> וַיִּפְתַּח֙ <sup>6605 </sup> <n>and opened</n> דַּלְת֣וֹת <sup>1817 </sup> <n>the doors</n> הַבַּ֔יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> וַיֵּצֵ֖א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and went out</n> לָלֶ֣כֶת <sup>1980 </sup> <n>to go</n> לְדַרְכּ֑וֹ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>his way</n> וְהִנֵּ֧ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>and behold the woman</n> פִֽילַגְשׁ֗וֹ <sup>6370 </sup> <n>his concubine</n> נֹפֶ֙לֶת֙ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>was fallen down</n> פֶּ֣תַח <sup>6607 </sup> <n>[at] the door</n> הַבַּ֔יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> וְיָדֶ֖יהָ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>and her hands</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הַסַּֽף׃ <sup>5592 </sup> <n>[were] upon the threshold</n>
28: וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> אֵלֶ֛יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to her</n> ק֥וּמִי <sup>6965 </sup> <n>unto her Up</n> וְנֵלֵ֖כָה <sup>1980 </sup> <n>go</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> עֹנֶ֑ה <sup>6030 </sup> <n>But none answered</n> וַיִּקָּחֶ֙הָ֙ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>took</n> עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>her on</n> הַחֲמ֔וֹר <sup>2543 </sup> <n>her [up] upon an ass</n> וַיָּ֣קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>rose up</n> הָאִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>Then the man</n> וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and went</n> לִמְקֹמֽוֹ׃ <sup>4725 </sup> <n>him unto his place</n>
29: וַיָּבֹ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>And when he was come</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> בֵּית֗וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>into his house</n> וַיִּקַּ֤ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>he took</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַֽמַּאֲכֶ֙לֶת֙ <sup>3979 </sup> <n>a knife</n> וַיַּחֲזֵ֣ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>and laid hold</n> בְּפִֽילַגְשׁ֔וֹ <sup>6370 </sup> <n>on his concubine</n> וַֽיְנַתְּחֶ֙הָ֙ <sup>5408 </sup> <n>and divided</n> לַעֲצָמֶ֔יהָ <sup>6106 </sup> <n>her [together] with her bones</n> לִשְׁנֵ֥ים <sup>8147 </sup> <n>both</n> עָשָׂ֖ר <sup>6240 </sup> <n>ten</n> נְתָחִ֑ים <sup>5409 </sup> <n>pieces</n> וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֶ֔הָ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and sent</n> בְּכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>her throughout</n> גְּב֥וּל <sup>1366 </sup> <n>her into all the coasts</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
30: וְהָיָ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>And it was so</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> הָרֹאֶ֗ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>that all that saw</n> וְאָמַר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>it said</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nothing</n> נִהְיְתָ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has happened</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nothing</n> נִרְאֲתָה֙ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>done nor seen</n> כָּזֹ֔את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>There was no such deed</n> לְמִיּ֞וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>from the day</n> עֲל֤וֹת <sup>5927 </sup> <n>came up</n> בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>that the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> מִצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> עַ֖ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> הַיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>unto this day</n> הַזֶּ֑ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> שִֽׂימוּ־ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>consider</n> לָכֶ֥ם עָלֶ֖יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> עֻ֥צוּ <sup>5779 </sup> <n>of it take advice</n> וְדַבֵּֽרוּ׃ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and speak</n> פ
